Ariana DeBose will return as host for the 2023 Tony Awards, which will take place on Sunday, June 11 at New York City's Washington Heights.

articles.author: Amy Lamare
articles.title: Kelly Ripa and Mark Consuelos talk marriage and hosting Live together - Daily Mail
articles.description:
Kelly Ripa and Mark Consuelos are about to get a lot of time together.
The longtime host of Live with Kelly and Ryan is about to bid adieu to Ryan Seacrest and have her husband co-host with her.
articles.content:
Kelly Ripa and Mark Consuelos are about to spend a lot more time together. 
The longtime host of Live with Kelly and Ryan is set to bid adieu to Ryan Seacrest and have her husband of 27 years take t… [+3502 chars]
